data.title: Your favourites feature
data.body: Whilst our Black Friday early access savings and deal of the day offers are well underway, there’s plenty more to look forward to as we edge closer to the main sale event which starts at 7am on Friday 24th November. This year we've also made it easier than ever to shop with our brand new Your favourites feature. Simply log in to the app and follow these steps to see offers from the brands you love the most this Black Friday. Step 1: Search for your most-loved brands Step 2: Hit the star button to favourite your brand Step 3: Head back to the homepage and see your personalised Your Favourites menu Step 4: If you don’t see it first time, reload the app and it will appear! Click here to see the step-by-step guide We hope that you like this new feature which makes shopping your favourite brands at Blue Light Card easier than ever before. Some of our app users might experience a delay in seeing this feature as it’s gradually rolled out over the next week or two.

data.title: Black Friday 2023
data.body: Black Friday is coming… and we’ll be ready! Can’t wait to complete your Christmas shopping? Saving up to invest in an essential? Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered with over 200 exclusive Black Friday discounts on the brands you love!  We know how hard you each work throughout the year so we want to use the ‘season of giving’ as an opportunity to give back to all of our Blue Light Card members for your efforts in keeping us safe, healthy and supported. SIGN UP NOW This year’s Black Friday explained: New for 2023 are our 'deal of the day' offers. These are exclusive for our members and are only available for 24 hours. Expect to see access to brands including Hotpoint, Hoover, New Look, Ninja, Shark and Virgin Experience Days. Our early access offers will be available from 13th November onwards, including: Currys - Save 10% on all Windows laptops Hotpoint - Save 30% sitewide KitchenAid - Save 20% on the full range and 30% on selected products Ninja - Save an extra 10% on top of sale Samsung - Get an extra 10% off on home appliances in the sale Dreamcloud - Save 58% on any mattress and bedding set Hotels.com - Save 12%  Check out some of our fantastic Blue Light Card Black Friday partners below, or log into your account on Friday 24th November to see the full range of increased discounts on offer. Benson’s for Beds, Booking.com, Butlin’s, Cult Beauty, Debenhams, Dorothy Perkins, Emma Sleep, ESPA, Expedia, Footasylum, Foot Locker, Garmin, Halfords, Hoover, Hotpoint, KitchenAid, LOOKFANTASTIC, Mama Mio, Pooch & Mutt, Ray-Ban, Regatta, Samsung, Wallis, Yankee Candle… And so many more...  New for 2023 Your favourites We want to show you the best deals on the brands you love. Simply go to the offers you shop the most and hit the ‘favourite’ button and we’ll do the rest. Personalised content straight to the app. General offers We appreciate that your time is precious, that’s why we’re bringing you all the Black Friday offers in one place. Whilst we know some of these won’t be exclusive discounts for our members, we’ve done the hard work so you don’t need to shop around. A message from our COO: Commenting on the savings, Andy Collins, COO of Blue Light Card said:  “This year, more than ever, everybody is looking after the pennies to save the pounds, as the cost of living crisis continues to put a strain on budgets, especially around Christmas. To help ease the festive pressures, and to help our members plan ahead, we’re delighted to play our part in supporting the hard working individuals that keep us safe and sound, all year long. “The Blue Light community certainly knows the effects of winter on the emergency services, and many will be working long and tiring shifts throughout the winter period. “As a token of thanks to the millions of people working tirelessly in the emergency services, NHS, armed forces and social care sector, we invite them to take advantage of these brilliant Black Friday deals and exclusive early access. Whether buying a well-deserved treat for themselves, an impromptu gift for others, or getting ahead in their Christmas shopping - we hope these deals bring joy to all of our members.” Eligible members can access all discounts through the Blue Light Card website, app or card.

data.title: Paw-some savings this International Dog Day
data.body: Happy International Dog Day to all of our four-legged friends! (And to their humans too!) Life as dog owner is special, but it’s not always the cheapest – from food to vet bills, or toys and accessories… or sometimes replacing your own furniture! To help, here are some ways you can make some paws-itively incredible savings when shopping for your pooch. A well-fed dog is a happy dog! Subscriptions are a wallet-friendly way of saving money on your dog’s food throughout the year, and with Pooch and Mutt you can save 15% off subscriptions fur-ever. For everything else, new Pooch and Mutt customers can save 33% off, and existing 31% off. If you’re looking for a tailor-made plan for your dog, then explore Tails.com’s offer of 80% off your first box (new customers only). If your pup is a fussy eater, then explore the menu on offer at Edmondson’s Dog Food, and save 10% in the process. You’re only as stylish as your dog Be the most stylish partners on your daily walk and look absolutely fur-bulous next time you’re out. Whether it’s safe, secure and stylish harnesses – or leads and accessories – you’re barking up the right tree with Bully Billows, and you could save 15% off full price today. If outdoor adventures are your thing, Ruffwear has the performance clothing and accessories you need – save 20% off full price online! Alternatively, for a one-stop shop for dog accessories, beds and more, save an extra 5% when you shop at Robert Dyas online. You’ll probably grab some other bargains while you’re there too! Essential dog supplies It’s a dog’s life but an owner’s bank account… so these essentials will come in handy! Zooplus offers 5% off an ulti-mutt range of essential supplies – from bowls, beds and baskets, to grooming and training accessories. ID tags are an absolute must for any dog-owner, so keep your pup safe while you save 10% off with Pet Tags. Like you, we can’t help but spoil our dogs, so whether you’re treating them just because, or are planning Christmas very early, Pet Hampers offers the perfect present for your pampered pooch, plus 15% off. Dog-friendly festivals are also essential, right? We think so! Blue Light Card members can now save 20% off tickets to DogFest events across the UK! They’re a dog-lovers dream! Replace the furniture If your dog is one with the habit of destroying the furniture – yet still being lovable – check out all of our home and garden savings for any replacements! üò¨üòÅ

Save 7% on spabreaks.com or claim 20% off discounted spa trips with Virgin Experience Days. Find out the most common vitamins and minerals that might need a bit of a boost and save 20% off award-winning snacks and supplements with Grenade. Alternatively, you can get 15% off online orders and 10% off when you shop in-store at Holland & Barrett or save 20% on boosting your mental wellbeing with Brain Feed's range of supplements, including: Serotonin enhancement - 5htp: the building block to your feel-good chemical messenger serotonin. Dopamine precursor - tyrosine: the building block to dopamine your reward & pleasure chemical messenger. Work enhancement - Alpha GPC: a potent form of choline that increases levels of your memory & learning chemical messenger. Relax - natural theanine: Aid relaxation without sedation with this nutrient extracted from green tea. Want to exercise first? Working out your muscles doesn’t mean having to put up with pain however!  Save on therapy devices, massage guns and wellness technology with 5% off sitewide at Therabody (including their cutting-edge Theragun), and 10% off all Hyperice’s range of percussive, thermal tech, vibration and air compression recovery tools. Not yet a member? No problem! We’ve joined with over 17,500 companies to give back and say thank you – helping you save over £250 million last year – and signing up to Blue Light Card is quick and easy! So, whether you’re shopping online or on the high street, why not become a member and see how you can save on all your favourite brands?
